name: Mind if I drop in?
description:
Mind if I drop in?

#7drl 2021 Entry

A physics based, autobattler, roguelike, etc, etc cobbled together in 7 days by @grgkemp.

How To Play

Your friends will fight for you, just place where you want them to land! After a battle you have an opportunity to buy a new friend before visiting the next Island.

If you own 3 of one type it will combine to form a stronger friend.

Notes

Any friends or foes that fall off the platform will appear in the next shop, half price! 

The more health a friend has, the harder they are to push around.

Left & right arrows will spin the platform.

This #7drl build has 5 friend types and the difficulty increases each island by adding more foes at higher levels. 

The game might not load in Safari.
